<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Get namespace by name</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"get"} path={"/v2/projects/{projectId}/namespace-by-name/{name}"}></MethodEndpoint>



Returns information about a namespace by its name

## Request
